titles: Funerall elegies; consecrated to the immortall memory, of the Right Honorable the Lady Katherine Paston, late wife to the truely noble, and heroicke, William Paston, of Oxned Esquire
author: Knevet, Ralph, 1600-1671.
publisher: Printed by T. Cotes, for Andrew Crooke, dwelling at the signe of the Gun in Ivy-lane,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
